source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_00<tab>Cyr must once more enter into a world he does not quite understand.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_00<tab>エーテライト・プラザのキールは、冒険者に協力してほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_01Inspector's Log:
As invigorating as my sojourn in the skies above was, full glad I am to be back on terra firma. Of course, the landing left much to be desired─as did my father's overzealous efforts to pluck me from the snow─but in painful circumstance did we enjoy encounters serendipitous and strange. A good and true Gentle Dead Man, far removed from the sands of Ul'dah, and Gigi, a precocious young lad seemingly bereft of all memories. Some might dismiss these events as the mere whims of fate, but I say, if these be not the beginnings of a spectacular case, then my name is not Hildibrand Helidor Maximilian Manderville!
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
Cyr's superiors at the Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine have decided that, in the interest of public safety, the mammet Gigi must be seized and subjected to thorough examination. Should it be determined that the mammet is of heretical origin, it is to be destroyed─a judgment not like to sit well with Inspector Hildibrand, who has taken to escorting the “young boy” around the city of Ishgard, in an effort to help him recover his missing memories.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
事件屋ヒルディブランドと再会を果たしたところ、彼は雪中から謎の魔法人形を引っ張り出した。「ギギ」と名付けられた、その魔法人形は、記憶を失っていた。事件の匂いを嗅ぎつけたヒルディブランドは、ギギの記憶を取り戻すため、イシュガルドで行動を開始したのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
キールは異端審問局からギギを没収するよう命じられ、冒険者はその協力を頼まれた。イシュガルドのフォルタン伯爵邸付近にいる「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_02<tab>In predictable fashion, Cyr's attempt to convince Hildibrand to surrender Gigi into his custody somehow leads to a debate on the mammet's gender. The commotion serves to draw Lord Edmont out from nearby Fortemps Manor, who agrees with the inspector that the mammet is clearly a boy. Upon learning of the inquisition's interest in Gigi, the count suggests that Hildibrand adopt the mammet as a ward, and even offers to stand as witness. Fascinated and enchanted by the thought of becoming a father, the inspector readily agrees, and Cyr can only look on in horror as Gigi is formally granted the patronage of House Manderville. It would seem there is nothing more to be done...but Inquisitor Cyr is a man bound by duty, and he is not yet ready to leave the mammet and its caretakers to their own devices, even as they embark upon another tour of the city to stir Gigi's memories.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_02<tab>ヒルディブランドと話した。エドモン・ド・フォルタンの提案で、ギギはヒルディブランドの養子になった。ヒルディブランドはギギに都市内の様々なものを見せて、記憶を取り戻すことにしたようだ。ギギを没収することができなくなったキールは、異端の証拠を掴むまで監視することにした。イシュガルドの神聖裁判所付近にいる「ギギ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_03<tab>In an impressive display of ignorance, Hildibrand introduces the Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine─the Ishgardian institution which Cyr so proudly serves─to Gigi as a manor of “House Durenmaeltempsarte.” The inquisitor is quick to correct the inspector, who good-humoredly overlooks the incident. In any event, the name matters little, belonging as it does to but one more location which means nothing to the amnesic mammet.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_03<tab>ギギと合流した。彼は何も思い出せないようだ。ヒルディブランドの提案でチョコボを見にいくことになった。イシュガルドのチョコボ留付近にいる「ギギ」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_04<tab>The Holy Stables prove no more familiar to Gigi than the Tribunal, even after he takes a good, long whiff of the horsebirds' natural musk. Cyr observes that Gigi may not be native to Ishgard, leading Hildibrand to propose that you all visit the Jeweled Crozier next, and Cyr to subsequently berate himself for aiding in the inspector's endeavors.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_04<tab>ギギと合流した。やはり、彼は何も思い出せないようだ。キールの提案で商店に並んだ品を見にいくことになった。イシュガルドの宝杖通りにいる「ギギ」と合流しよう。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_05A despondent Gigi once more fails to recall his memories and mutters that there is no point to this exercise. In an effort to raise his adopted son's spirits, the inspector resorts to his trademark pose, sending a precariously placed vase crashing to the ground. To Cyr's horror, the stall's owner reveals that the vase was valued at one hundred and twenty-three million, five hundred and four thousand gil, having been owned by countless esteemed personages, including one Ishgardian duke. However, before she can demand recompense, Gigi restores the vase to its original form in an unexpected display of magical prowess.

The stunned inquisitor declares Gigi's accomplishment a miracle, unable to fully comprehend what he has just witnessed. Sensing an opportunity, the merchant promptly offers to purchase the mammet from the inspector, who is taken aback at the suggestion he sell his adopted son. But Gigi has had enough; he can no longer entertain the illusion that he is flesh and blood. In the face of the inspector's continued insistence that he is a Manderville, the mammet storms off, declaring that Hildibrand and Nashu are not his papa and mama, leaving the stunned pair to watch in silence.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_05<tab>ギギと合流したが、ここでも彼は何も思い出せなかった。しかし、ヒルディブランドが割ってしまった商品の壺を、ギギは不思議な力で元通りにするのだった。一行が驚く中、ギギは自分が「魔法人形」であることを知ると、どこかへ走り去ってしまった。宝杖通りの「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_06<tab>"Gigi is at a rebellious age,“ Hildibrand declares, confident that he can weather the storm and regain his beloved son's trust. The key, Nashu believes, is to find out what first convinced Gigi that he was a mammet─a suggestion which Cyr lacks the will to dispute.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_SEQ_06<tab>ヒルディブランドと話した。彼は父親として試されているというが、キールは、早くギギを探したいようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hildibrand outside Fortemps Manor.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_00<tab>フォルタン伯爵邸付近のヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_01<tab>Follow Gigi.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_01<tab>ギギと合流

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_02<tab>Accompany Gigi to the Holy Stables.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_02<tab>チョコボ留付近のギギと合流

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_03<tab>Accompany Gigi to the Jeweled Crozier.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_03<tab>宝杖通りのギギと合流

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Hildibrand.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_TODO_04<tab>ヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_000<tab>I pray this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var> finds you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─or at least better than it finds me. <sigh> It seems I have no choice but to seek out that inspector and convince him to surrender up his mammet to me.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_000どうも、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
例の事件屋たちが拾った魔法人形なのですが、
異端審問局から、没収して調査するように命じられました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_001<tab>'Twas unearthed under most suspicious circumstances, after all, and who can say what secrets─or heresy─it might hold. Therefore, the inquisition would conduct a thorough inspection, and if needs must, destroy it.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_001よくよく考えてみれば、あの魔法人形……物凄く怪しいですよね。
少しばかり拝借して、ちょちょいとバラして中身を確認できれば、
異端の証拠のひとつやふたつ、見つけられると思います。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_002<tab>Given his affinity for the contraption, I fear the inspector may not be amenable to my request. Nevertheless, he must be made to see that it is in the interest of public safety. Would you be willing to help me persuade him?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_002とはいえ、事件屋たちが大人しく人形を渡すとも思えません。
ここはひとつ、彼らと縁のあるあなたに同行していただきたい。
事を円滑に運ぶため……ぜひ、協力をお願いします。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_003<tab>Fury be praised, at least you have seen reason. Let us pray he will as well.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_003ありがとうございます。
彼らは、都市内であの人形を知る者を探していましたが、
結局、見つからずじまいだったようです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_004<tab>I am given to understand that while the inspector and his assistant have been wandering all over the city with the mammet in tow, they often frequent the gazebo near Fortemps Manor. With any luck, they will be there now.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_004そのくせ、皇都にすっかり居着いてしまい、
厚かましくも、フォルタン伯爵邸の東屋でたむろしています。
それでは、向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_010<tab>To ThE vErY pInNaClE oF tHe HeAvEnS!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_010<tab>天知る地知る、事件知る、旅の事件屋は～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_011<tab>Isn't she adorable!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_011<tab>ギギさん、可愛いです～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_020<tab>Verily shall we scour all creation─from the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens─for the answers we seek! Every day shall be filled with grand adventures─the stuff of faerie tales and legends!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_020天知る地知る、事件知る、旅の事件屋は～！
毎日が最高！　毎日がお宝！
さあ、続けて～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_021<tab>HuZzAh! A gRaNd AdVeNtUrE iN tHe DeEpEsT pIt Of ThE sEvEn HeLlS!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_021天知る地知る、事件知る、旅の事件屋は～！
毎日が最高！　毎日がお宝！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_022<tab>Just so! Such is the creed of Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_022その調子ですぞ～。
それこそ、この事件屋ヒルディブランドのモットー！
さあここで、すかさずいつものポーズで締めれば完璧です！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_023<tab>Well posed, Gigi, well posed! I daresay you have the potential to be an exemplary inspector someday!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_023素晴らしい！
ギギ殿は呑み込みが早いですなぁ。
事件屋としての類まれな才能を感じますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_024<tab>Right, that's enough of that! By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine, I hereby command you to surrender that mammet of suspected heretical origin into my custody.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_024取り込み中のところ申し訳ないですが、
その魔法人形は異端の疑いにより、没収させていただきます！
大人しく引き渡していただきたい！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_025<tab>Why, hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And Inquisitor Cyr, ever the jester! Accusing poor Gigi of being a clockwork heretic when 'tis plain to see that he is merely a precocious young lad!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_025これは、キール殿と)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
ギギ殿が異端だなんて、おかしなことを言いますなぁ。
そもそも、この子は人形ではなく、れっきとした男の子ですぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_026<tab>Oh, there you go again, confusing the poor girl! As if those big, beautiful, boxy eyes aren't the soul of femininity!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_026そうですよ、異端なんかじゃありません。
でもでも、ギギさんは可愛い女の子ですからね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_027<tab>Nashu, please. Were you not witness to the magnificent display of Mandervillian masculinity mere moments ago?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_027ナシュ、まだ言いますか？
先ほどの力強いポーズを見たでしょう？
どう見ても、ギギ殿は男の子に間違いありません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_028<tab>That's 'cause you haven't taught her any better. She needs a proper role model to show her what's what!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_028いえいえ、それは違いますよ～。
ギギさんには、可愛らしいポーズだって似合います～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_029<tab>(-???-)<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>? Inspector Cyr? What is all this commotion? We can hear you from the courtyard...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_029(-？？？？-)おやおや、なにやら賑やかだと思ったら……
あなたたちでしたか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_030<tab>Oh, Lord Edmont! My sincerest apologies for the disturbance. I am come to seize this mammet on behalf of the inquisition─a fact which I clearly explained to the inspector before you arrived.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_030ちょうどよかった、エドモン様！
良識ある貴方からも、彼らに真実を突きつけてやってください！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_031<tab>At which point they set to bickering about the contraption's gender...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_031<tab>コレはどう見ても、魔法人形である……と！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_032<tab>What say you, my lord? Do you think Gigi a boy or a girl?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_032<tab>どう見ても、男の子でしょう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_033<tab>...'Tis clearly a strapping young lad, no?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_033<tab>………………男の子ですな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_034<tab>Fury take me, not you too! Has the whole world gone mad?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_034嗚呼、エドモン様まで！
いったい、何をおっしゃるのやら……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_035<tab>Fine, fine! But even supposing that this Gigi is a “real boy,” you cannot deny that the circumstances of his discovery and <var 1A 02 /var>miraculous resuscitation<var 1A 01 /var> were most unusual. He cannot be suffered to roam the city with impunity until the inquisition has determined he is not a threat!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_035百歩譲って男の子でも、異端の恐れがある身元不明の者を、
このまま皇都に入れておくわけにはいきません。
こちらで勾留することにします！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_036<tab>I beg your pardon? “Miraculous resuscitation”?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_036まあまあ、お待ちなさい。
いったい、どういった事情なのでしょう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_037<tab>I see... Then until such time as Gigi recovers his memory, mayhap it would be best if you adopted him as a ward of House Manderville. I will even stand as witness here and now, if you wish.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_037なるほど、記憶喪失の迷子ということですか。
……それならば、身元が明らかになるまでの間、
彼をヒルディブランド殿の養子として迎えるのはどうです？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_038<tab>Doubtless the inquisition would think better of taking any action which might threaten the cordial relationship between our two houses.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_038マンダヴィル家の者となれば、
皇都での身元は、このエドモン・ド・フォルタンが保証しましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_039<tab>A-A-Adopt? Then that would make me...Gigi's <var 1A 02 /var>father<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_039<tab>こ、この私が父親にっ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_040<tab>Yes, yes, of course! I'll do it! I, Hildibrand, agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire, do hereby grant this child the patronage of House Manderville!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_040それは素晴らしいアイディアですな！
よし、ギギは今から我が愛息子ですぞ！
これからは、私のことを父上と呼ぶのです！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_041<tab>PaPa HiLdY! pApA hIlDy!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_041<tab>父上、父上ー！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_042<tab>The inspector's finally become a father! <sniffle> It's...it's so beautiful!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_042ヒルディブランド様がお父様になるなんて、
素敵です～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_043<tab>Quite. Ahem. Now that you need no longer fear the inquisition, you are free to show Gigi more of our fair city. Indeed, I strongly encourage you to do so. Mayhap, by the grace of the Fury, something will jog his memory.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_043ギギ殿を知る者が見つからぬというのなら、
彼に都市内の様々なものを見せてみてはいかがかな？
何かのきっかけで、記憶が呼び覚まされるかもしれませんぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_044<tab>Thank you, Lord Edmont! I shall not forget this kindness! Come, my faithful assistant, my beloved son─we must away!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_044な、なんとも奇遇ですなぁ……
それはまさに今、私が考えていたこと！
では、さっそく都市内を回ってみますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_045<tab>O Halone, I would not presume to question Your grand design, but... Gah! Confound it all!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_045確かに、四大名家に連なるフォルタン家が後見人となれば、
異端の疑いだけで勾留することは……不可能！
ああ……なんでまた面倒なことに……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_046<tab>Well! Mayhap I cannot detain the mammet, but I am still within my rights to observe the blasted thing...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_046もうこうなったら、確固たる異端の証拠を掴むまで、
どこまでも監視してやりましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_047<tab>Lord Godbert will be pleased to hear that his son is as hale and healthy as ever. Not that I would ever presume to meddle on another father's behalf. And certainly not without consent.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_EDMONT_000_047実は、ゴッドベルト殿から息子の様子を、
それとなく見守ってもらえないかと、頼まれていたのだ。
フフフ……なかなかに愉快な方々のようですな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_050<tab>Judging by the size of their estate, they've wealth to rival House Manderville...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_050ふーむ、あの建物は、
我がマンダヴィル邸に匹敵するかもしれませんな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_051<tab>Ack. How long must I stand around waiting for that mammet to do something passably heretical...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_051はぁ……勢いで来ちゃいましたけど、
異端の証拠なんてどう掴めばいいのやら……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_052<tab>Cor, look at all them halberds! I've never seen such a well-armed building before!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_052<tab>建物、立派です～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_070<tab>HmMmMmM...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_070<tab>うーん……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_071<tab>Come now, Gigi! Surely gazing upon this wondrous work of Ishgardian architecture stirs something within your soul? This grand manor of House Duren...er, House Duren...maeltempsarte.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_071なんとも見事な建物ですな。
きっと名門貴族、デュランゼーメルタンハルト家のお屋敷でしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_072<tab>Pray do not fill the boy─the <var 1A 02 /var>mammet's<var 1A 01 /var> head with such nonsense. That is the Supreme Sacred Tribunal of Halonic Inquisitory Doctrine. I should know─I work there.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_072適当なこといわないでください……
僕が所属する異端審問局も置かれている、神聖裁判所ですよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_073<tab>Furthermore, I am quite certain that there is no “House Durenmaeltempsarte” and that it is rather a ludicrous portmanteau of the four High Houses, including that esteemed house which but recently stood as witness to your adoption.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_073大体、デュランゼーメルタンハルト家ってなんですか？
歴史ある四大名家を、ひとつにまとめないでください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_074<tab>Well, Gigi? Do you remember anything?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_074ギギさん、どうですか～？
何か思い出しました～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_075<tab>No, NoThInG...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_075<tab>……なんにも思い出せないよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_076<tab>I say, rather than parading him before the grandiose, why not give him a taste of something more prosaic? Let us make our way to the Holy Stables that he might bask in the singular sights, sounds, and smells of Ishgard's famous chocobos!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_076それでは、次は下層へ行ってみましょう。
みんな大好きな、チョコボでも見れば、
きっと何か思い出しますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_080<tab>Such noble creatures, chocobos. How many halcyon days did I pass in the saddle, racing across the windswept plains...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_080ハッハッハ、チョコボは可愛いですな。
小さい頃は、よくチョコボを乗せて荒野を走ったものです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_081<tab>Patience, patience... A watched heretic never sins...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_081僕はいま、何をしているのでしょうか？
だんだん、わからなくなってきました……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>So if I wanted hair that color, I'd have to eat plums, valfruits, and pineapples...but how many?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_082<tab>チョコボ、黄色いです～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_090<tab>HmMmMmM...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_090<tab>うーん……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_091<tab>Splendid specimens of horsebirdflesh, would you not agree? In the hands of a skilled jockey, any one of them could take first place at the Saucer.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_091ふむ、勇ましいチョコボですな。
ゴールドソーサーのチョコボレースで走れば、
いい結果を出せることでしょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_092<tab>These chocobos are the pride of the Ishgardian cavalry and any Temple Knight who dared exploit them for personal gain would answer to the Fury Herself.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_092誇り高き神殿騎士団のチョコボを、俗な遊びに利用するなんて……
そんな罪深いこと、僕は断固反対します。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_093<tab>How about now, Gigi? Do you remember anything about Ishgard? Be sure to sniff the chocobos─it might help!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_093<tab>ギギさん、何か思い出しました～？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_094<tab><sniff> <sniff> ...It DiDn'T.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_094<tab>……なんにも。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_095<tab>You know, just because you found him in a Coerthan snowbank, it doesn't mean he hails from Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_095宝杖通りへ行ってみてはどうです？
商店にはいろいろな品が並んでますから、
何かきっかけとなる物があるかもしれませんよ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_096<tab>Wait─am I now complicit in this farce? Fury forgive me...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_096<tab>な、なにを協力しているんだ、僕は……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_097<tab>...Which is why we ought to try taking him to the markets and exposing him to all manner of goods from across Eorzea! Excellent suggestion, Inquisitor!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_097キール殿、有益な助言に感謝しますぞ！
それでは、その「宝杖通り」とやらへ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_KID02228_000_098<tab>But I want one! I want one! Buy me a chocobo! Pleeease, Father!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_KID02228_000_098お父さん、お父さん！
チョコボ欲しい、買って、買って～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_KID02228_000_099<tab>Father, that strange-looking thing is staring at us...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_KID02228_000_099<tab>……なんか、変なのがこっち見てる～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_100<tab>GIGI※GIGIGI★※!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_100<tab>！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_101<tab>...Am I tHaT sTrAnGe-LoOkInG?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_101<tab>……ボクは……変……なの？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_110<tab>These goods would fetch a high price in Ul'dah...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_110ふぅむ……
ウルダハでは見かけないものばかりですな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_111<tab>Receive your orders, detain your heretic, meet your quota... Fury take me, it used to be so simple. Frightening on occasion, I grant you─what with my mentor's little episodes─but simple nonetheless.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_111はぁ……あてどもなく調査することが、こんなにしんどいとは……。
次々と異端者を捕縛していた、あの頃が懐かしいです。
上司はめちゃくちゃ怖かったですけどね……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_112<tab>What if I picked one with my eyes closed...and gave it as a nameday gift to myself!? Oh, I wonder what I'd get me!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_112<tab>商品、いろいろあります～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_060<tab>WhY bOtHeR. iT's No UsE...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_060……ダメだ。
ボク、なんにも思い出せないよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_061<tab>Now, now, Gigi, you must not give in to despair so easily! Did I not promise you days filled with grand adventures and the eventual discovery of your mislaid memories? Spirits, Gigi, spirits!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_061ハッハッハ、ギギよ。
何も、焦ることはありませんぞ。
こういうときこそ、こうして落ち着くのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_062<tab>My word, a vase flung to the ground with reckless abandon! Could this be the opening salvo of an indiscriminate campaign of vandalism?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_062ハッ、壺が爆発した……？
これは、新たな連続壺爆破事件の予感！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_063<tab>One waged by <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> wild gesticulations, perhaps. At least look before you strike a pose! The gods only know how much that vase cost...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_063あなたが割ったんでしょう？
まったく、どうするんですかこれ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_FRINE_000_064<tab>One hundred and twenty-three million, five hundred and four thousand gil, at last assessment. 'Twas over seven hundred years old and graced the homes of a dozen archbishops, eight counts, two lord commanders and one <var 1A 02 /var>duke<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_FRINE_000_064もちろん、弁償してもらうよ。
その壺は由緒ある名品だから、
ざっと1億ギルってとこかなぁ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_065<tab><cough> <var 1A 02 /var>One hundred million gil<var 1A 01 /var>!? <wheeze>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_065<tab>いッ、1億ギルゥゥゥ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_066<tab>O Halone, why have You forsaken me...?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_066おお、戦神ハルオーネよ！
なぜ我らを見捨てたもうたのか……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_067<tab>Well, would you look at that!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_067<tab>壺、ピカピカです～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_120<tab>It's...it's a miracle! Nay─the divine intervention of the Fury Herself!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_120ききききき奇跡だっ！
戦神ハルオーネは、我らを救いたもうた！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_121<tab>DiD i Do ThAt...?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_121<tab>こ、これ……ボクがやったの？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_123<tab>Gigi, my boy, that was marvelous! You're a born artisan, just like Father!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_123お見事でしたぞギギ！
割れた壺を直してしまうとは、
まるで、父上のようですな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_124<tab>PaPa HiLdY's PaPa?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_124<tab>父上の父上？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_125<tab>Your grandpapa Godbert─the man who woke you with a few gentle taps to the noggin. You wouldn't believe what else he can do with that hammer of his! Why, some folk say he wields the very powers of life and death!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_125ヒルディブランド様のお父様……ゴッドベルト様です～。
なんでも、ピカピカに直したり、作り変えたりできるんですよ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_126<tab>Once he and the missus come back from their tour of the western highlands, I'm sure they'd love to see that trick of yours.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_126ギギさんを目覚めさせたのも、ゴッドベルト様なのです～。
今は夫婦仲良く西部高地を旅行中ですよ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_127<tab>Do not demean this mammet's power as a mere parlor trick! We just witnessed a <var 1A 02 /var>miracle<var 1A 01 /var>, and I demand that you all acknowledge it!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_127ちょっと待った！
そんなことでこの奇跡を済ませていいんですか？
その「魔法人形」には不思議な力があるようだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_FRINE_000_128<tab>Sir! I-I say, sir! One hundred million gil for the mammet! Nay, one hundred million gil <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the duke's priceless vase!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_FRINE_000_128ね、ねえ、そこのアンタ……
その「魔法人形」売ってくれないか？
1億ギル……いや、2億ギル出すよ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_129<tab>ThIs...MaMmEt...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_129<tab>……魔法……人形。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_130<tab>My word, is this what passes for trade in Ishgard? Gigi is my flesh and blood! I will not <var 1A 02 /var>sell<var 1A 01 /var> him at any price!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_130商人殿、ギギは「魔法人形」ではありませんぞ。
ギギは私の愛息子、手放すことなどありえません。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_131<tab>PlEaSe, PaPa HiLdY, nO mOrE. i KnOw YoU mEaN wElL, bUt We CaN dEnY tHe TrUtH nO lOnGeR. I aM a MaMmEt.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_131……父上、もういいんだ。
ボクを勇気づけようとしてくれてありがとう。
でもやっぱり、みんなの言うとおり、ボクは「魔法人形」だ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_132<tab>Gigi, whatever has gotten into you? You are my son! You are a Manderville man!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_132ハッハッハ、そんなわけありません。
ギギは、私と同じ立派な男の子ですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_133<tab>Listen to your papa, Gigi! You're a Manderville girl, through and through!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_133そうですよ～、
ギギさんは、可愛い女の子ですから～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_134<tab>StOp It, BoTh Of YoU! yOu'Re NoT mY pApA oR mY mAmA!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_GIGI_000_134ボクはさっきから真剣に悩んでるのに！
もういいよっ、たくさんだっ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_140<tab>Ahhh, the unmistakable scent of─well, perhaps not heresy exactly... Regardless─that mammet's power cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_140あの奇跡の力……異端の匂いがプンプンしやがります！
一刻も早く、魔法人形を探し出さないと……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_141<tab>Oh, children do say the most hurtful things...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_141<tab>ギギさん、心配です～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab>Well, it is only to be expected. Gigi is at a rebellious age... Strange as it may sound, I too tested my parents' patience, and that on more than one occasion! But if they could weather the storm, then so can I!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_HILDIBRAND_000_150うーむ、ギギは難しい年頃のようですな……
マンダヴィル流交渉術も、ここでは通用しません。
父親としての実力が、今、試されている予感がしますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_151<tab>I say we find out what's got him thinking he's a mammet.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_151<tab>ギギさんの悩み、ちゃんと聞いてあげなきゃですね～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_152<tab>But he <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> a mammet! How can you not─ Oh, never mind.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB631_02228_CYR_000_152そういう問題じゃないと思いますが……
ともかく、どこかへ行ってしまった魔法人形を探さないと、
こちらも困りますよ……。
